backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the KidsLearn app, defining persistent types (Lessons, Flashcards, QuizQuestions, etc.), user profile management, session progress tracking, and admin-only content setup, with authorization via AccessControl mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (Alphabet, Poems, Numbers lessons with multilingual TTS support) to their source files, components, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document summarizing each frontend source file's purpose, covering pages, components, hooks, utilities, and styles for the KidsLearn multilingual kids education app.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, chart, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the KidsLearn React app, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app file that sets up TanStack Router with all application routes (home, lessons, quiz, games, dashboard, etc.) and wraps the app in a QueryClientProvider with a shared Header/Footer layout.
frontend/src/components/CelebrationAnima: Canvas-based confetti animation component that spawns 120 colored particles falling with gravity, running for 120 frames and calling an optional onComplete callback when finished.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: App footer component displaying the KidsLearn logo, navigation links to Support, Parent Dashboard, and Progress pages, copyright info, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Sticky app header with navigation buttons for back, home, donate, progress, and parent dashboard, plus login/logout controls using Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and persisted identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including lessons, flashcards, quiz questions, mini-game content, session progress, badges, and user profiles.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Google Fonts and Tailwind, defining CSS custom properties for theming, and declaring custom animations (flip card, confetti, bounce, wiggle, float, pulse-ring).
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AgeGroupSelection.tsx: Page displaying three age-group selection cards (Toddlers, Early Learners, Older Kids) that navigate to the subjects page with the chosen age group as a query parameter.
frontend/src/pages/AlphabetLesson.tsx: Renders an interactive alphabet lesson page supporting English, Telugu, Hindi, and Tamil, displaying each of the 26 letters with an image, multilingual word, and text-to-speech pronunciation.
frontend/src/pages/Donation.tsx: Displays a donation page for KidsLearn with a UPI QR code, copyable UPI ID, and bank transfer details, including a clipboard copy feature with visual feedback.
frontend/src/pages/Flashcards.tsx: Implements a flip-card flashcard viewer with subject-based fallback data (math, alphabet, science, Telugu, Hindi, English), supporting card navigation, flip animation, and text-to-speech.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Renders the KidsLearn home page with a hero banner, logo, and a grid of navigation cards linking to all major learning sections like Numbers, Alphabet, Quiz, and Progress.
frontend/src/pages/IndiaMap.tsx: Displays an interactive India map lesson listing all states with their names and capitals in four languages (English, Telugu, Hindi, Tamil), with a language selector.
frontend/src/pages/Lessons.tsx: Displays paginated lessons by subject (math, alphabet, science, Telugu, Hindi, English) with text-to-speech, navigation, and lesson completion tracking. Falls back to hardcoded lesson content if backend data is unavailable.
frontend/src/pages/MatchingGame.tsx: A multilingual emoji-to-word matching card game supporting English, Telugu, Hindi, and Tamil, with shuffle logic, wrong-pair feedback, attempt tracking, and a celebration animation on completion.
frontend/src/pages/MiniGame.tsx: Hosts multiple mini-games (memory pairs for toddlers, letter-matching for early learners, and a quiz for older kids) selected by age group, with badge awarding and celebration animation on win.
frontend/src/pages/NumbersLesson.tsx: An interactive numbers lesson (1â€“20) with emoji visual counts, multilingual word display (English, Telugu, Hindi, Tamil), and text-to-speech pronunciation support.
frontend/src/pages/ParentDashboard.tsx: A parent/teacher dashboard requiring Internet Identity login that displays a child's earned badges, completed lessons, quiz results, average score, and weak subject areas.
frontend/src/pages/PoemsLesson.tsx: A multilingual poems/nursery rhymes page supporting English, Telugu, Hindi, and Tamil, with per-language color themes, expandable poem cards, and text-to-speech playback for each line.
frontend/src/pages/Progress.tsx: Displays a logged-in user's learning progress including earned badges, completed lessons, and quiz results, with a login prompt for unauthenticated users and skeleton loading states.
frontend/src/pages/PuzzleGame.tsx: A word unscramble puzzle game supporting four languages where players click shuffled letter tiles to reconstruct words, with score tracking, celebration animations, and game-over handling.
frontend/src/pages/Quiz.tsx: A subject-based quiz page that fetches questions from the backend (with hardcoded fallbacks), tracks answers, awards badges, and records results for authenticated users via ICP hooks.
frontend/src/pages/SubjectSelection.tsx: A subject and activity selection hub that lets users navigate to lessons, flashcards, quizzes, mini-games, and other activities filtered by age group and subject.
frontend/src/pages/TimedChallenge.tsx: A timed quiz game page supporting English, Telugu, Hindi, and Tamil with multiple-choice questions, a countdown timer, score tracking, and a celebration animation on completion.
frontend/src/pages/VocabularyLesson.tsx: A vocabulary lesson page displaying categorized words (body parts, animals, trees, flowers) with emojis and translations across English, Telugu, Hindi, and Tamil, with text-to-speech support.
frontend/src/utils/sessionManager.ts: Manages a persistent session ID stored in sessionStorage, generating a new UUID-based ID if one does not already exist.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color palettes (sunshine, grass, tangerine, cherry, sky, lavender) and custom font families (Fredoka One, Nunito) for the kid-friendly app theme.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for the KidsLearn app, documenting the current version, existing features, architectural notes, known issues, and required image assets for the alphabet section.
